metadata.title: CVE-2021-32850 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: jQuery MiniColors is a color picker built on jQuery. Prior to version2.3.6, jQuery MiniColors is prone to cross-site scripting when handlinguntrusted color names. This issue is patched in version 2.3.6.

criterions.comment: jquery-minicolors: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
